name: Tank Me Later - KO Jam
description:
This game was created in 16 hours total during the #KORemoteJam. Initially I tried to create another game that totally sucked, but was a nice experience. So I switched to create this wave-based shooter and this is the final result. 

Controls

Arrows + Mouse

ASDW + Mouse

Tools Used

Asesprite

Construct 3

BFRX

Sound Track by: www.abstractionmusic.com

Have fun, enjoy, and don't expect too much lol....
